Notes
Familiar: Monkey "Bantcasho"
Familiar Features: Companion Alertness; Companion Evasion; Companion Improved Evasion; Companion Spell Resistance; Deliver Touch Spells; Empathic Link; Scry; Share Spells; Speak With Like Animals; Speak With Master
Familiar Stats: AC: 24; CMB: 10; CMD: 16; Cha: 5; Con: 10; Dex: 15; Fort: 6; HD: 20; HP: 26; Init: 2; Int: 15; Melee: +14 1d3-4; Ref: 8; SR: DC 25; Size: T; Str: 3; Will: 13; Wis: 12
Companion Notes:
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Companion Improved Evasion: Failed Reflex save yields half damage
Deliver Touch Spells: Deliver touch spells if in contact w/master when cast
Empathic Link: Share emotions up to 1 mile
Scry: Master views companion 1/dy
Share Spells: Master share self spell w/companion w/in 5'
Speak With Like Animals: Talk w/similar creatures
Speak With Master: Talk w/master in secret language
Sanity Notes: Familiar Monkey: Implies skills.Acrobatics > 0
